title: Chain Upgrade
summary: This is v0.26 software upgrade for the Synternet Data Layer Mainnet
details:
This is v0.26 software upgrade for the Synternet Data Layer Mainnet.

If upgrade proposal passed, it would commit the Synternet Data Layer Chain to halting the Synternet Chain application binary at block height 6141826 (approximately 16:00 UTC on July 23rd 2025) and starting the new Synternet Chain application binary. Synternet Chain node operators must have already prepared the correct binary before the Synternet Chain halts and be ready to launch it after the Synternet Chain halts. For more information on deploying and managing validator binaries: https://docs.synternet.com/docs/for-validators/Mainnet/becoming-a-validator.

This upgrade proposal adds a few key improvements:
- Critical fix for Burn functionality.
- Multisig and Ledger support for Burn message.
vote_option_context: Voting positively will halt the chain at proposed height and require running v0.26.0 binary. Voting negatively will postpone the upgrade.
